summary.span: 提供由视觉样式为特定元素指定的字体相关的基本信息。

span.span: Provides basic information about the font specified by a visual style for a particular element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构指定方法的返回值 。The structure specifies the return values of the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置该字体中字符的平均宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the average width of characters in the font.

value.span: 该字体中字符的平均宽度。

span.span: The average width of characters in the font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常字符宽度定义为字母 "x" 的宽度。The average character width is generally defined as the width of the letter "x". 此值不包括粗体或斜体字符所需的延伸。This value does not include the overhang required for bold or italic characters.

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序在各行之间添加的附加行距量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of extra leading that the application adds between rows.

value.span: 各行之间需要的附加行距（空格）量。

span.span: The amount of extra leading (space) required between rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于前导区域超出字体，因此它不包含任何标记，并且在不透明或透明模式下，文本输出调用不会对其进行更改。Because the leading area is outside the font, it contains no marks and is not altered by text output calls in either opaque or transparent mode.
